comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Sounds good to me. Anyone up for a trail ride tomorrow?

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: My excuse? We had some consultants in until 12:30 to install a demo content switch for testing. Sorry. I did manage to get out for a solo ride and enjoy the weather. Kevin

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm afraid my excuse makes me sound like a turkey but it's true--I have a cold. Gobble gobble.
